title: High ping on mac
body:
Hi all,
I recently moved from playing LoL on my windows computer to my mac and now I'm getting very high ping. This has never happened to  me before whilst playing on my windows computer. My usual ping is 70-100ms but now it spikes from 300-1000ms and for a few seconds I get around 70 ping. Any ideas on how to fix this? 

Any help would be greatly appreciated

replies.body:
Hey Doodle Mcgee,

Give the solutions in the [**Troubleshooting Connection Issues**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-troubleshooting#section-mac) Riot Games Support article a shot and let me know if anything works for you!

hi wuks,
the problem isn't with my fps but my ping (i get well over 60 fps). I have tried everything on your list but none has resolved the issue. However i did play a few games and my ping has settled down to under 100ms but recently it has spiked up again. is this just my internet causing the problem?
Thanks, the issue has been solved now. Turns out I just had to restart my router. Thanks for the help
just did the same thing after you said that, worked for me. thanks man :)
Oh, shoot! I did link the wrong article. My mistake!

ATTENTION THIS IS HUGE MAC USERS

MY Mac ping was spiking every 6-12 seconds. It was almost double in this period. 

Q: How did I know this?
A: 1 - Locate the app "Terminal"
   2 - type "ping google.com" 

The Fix
  Forget all the other networks except the current network you are on. 

this worked for me anyway. 

Also - DO NOT EDIT YOUR REGISTRY - EVER
